title: How to unsubscribe from InPost
description: Learn how to cancel your InPost subscription. Follow these steps to manage your InPost subscription and shipment cancellations effectively.

steps_1.title: Cancel Subscription via Website
steps_1.description:
To cancel your InPost subscription via the website:

*   Go to the InPost website.
*   Log in to your InPost account.
*   Navigate to the 'Subscription' or 'Account Settings' section.
*   Find the 'Cancel Subscription' option.
*   Follow the on-screen instructions to complete the cancellation process.

steps_2.title: Cancel Shipment via Website
steps_2.description:
To cancel a shipment via the InPost website:

*   Fill out a request form on the InPost website.
*   Select 'Withdrawal from an InPost Direct shipment' as the reason for cancellation.

steps_3.title: Withdraw Consent via Email
steps_3.description:
To withdraw consent for receiving information from InPost:

*   Send the request to dane_osobowe@inpost.pl.

seo_text: Cancel InPost subscription, InPost cancellation guide, unsubscribe from InPost, cancel InPost shipment, InPost subscription management.
